no.hig.hers.ludoserver

Class ChatHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.hig.hers.ludoserver.ChatHandler

  • public class ChatHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for handling chat messages, serverside.
    Author:
    Daniel on 26.11.2015

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) static void createNewChat(Player p, java.lang.String msg)
      Method for handling the creation of a new chat.
      (package private) static void playerJoinChat(Player p, java.lang.String msg)
      Method handles a player joining a chat, first finding the Chat, then sending a message to all players in that chat then adding the player to the playerlist of that chat, finally sending the player the list of players in that chat.
      (package private) static void playerLeaveChat(Player p, java.lang.String msg)
      Method for handling a player leaving a chat.
      (package private) static void sendChatMessage(Player p, java.lang.String msg)
      Method handling chat messages.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • playerJoinChat

        static void playerJoinChat(Player p,
                           java.lang.String msg)
        Method handles a player joining a chat, first finding the Chat, then sending a message to all players in that chat then adding the player to the playerlist of that chat, finally sending the player the list of players in that chat.
        Parameters:
        p - The player joining the chat
        msg - The chatname

      • sendChatMessage

        static void sendChatMessage(Player p,
                            java.lang.String msg)
        Method handling chat messages. Sends the chat message to all players that's in the Chat.
        Parameters:
        p - The player that sent the message.
        msg - The message to send.

      • createNewChat

        static void createNewChat(Player p,
                          java.lang.String msg)
        Method for handling the creation of a new chat. If the chat already exists, send ERRORCHAT to the user that created the chat. If not, add the chat to the list, and send the new chat to all players.
        Parameters:
        p - The Player that created the chat.
        msg - Constants.NEWCHAT followed by the new chatname.

      • playerLeaveChat

        static void playerLeaveChat(Player p,
                            java.lang.String msg)
        Method for handling a player leaving a chat. First finds the chat the player is trying to leave, then removing the player from it. If the chat then is empty, sends a message to all players to remove the chat from their chat list, then removing it from the servers list. Lastly, sends a message to all remaining players that the player has left.
        Parameters:
        p - The leaving player
        msg - The chat the player is leaving
